text: Today in the #CSAC Bulletin, access a sample letter to support a county coalition #Broadband budget ask, learn about the latest #COVID19 #vaccine eligibility changes, a new CSAC resource on the #AmericanRescuePlan, California's #drought status and more. https://t.co/jU55K6gFLk https://t.co/VzszAqSVgB
